content:
the GraphDef.profile definition is confusing : http://build.fhir.org/graphdefinition-definitions.html#GraphDefinition.profile

I think the short name should be: "Profile on starting resource" and definition "The profile of the FHIR resource at which instances of this graph start"
and the comment removed...
Prefer "root" to "starting" in the short name, but otherwise agree. Care to make a change request?
